channel.title: 'SinScape' ? New name later maybe :P
channel.description:
I've decided to make a quick one day project. You just download a client, open it, make a character and play. Nothing else.
I'll be coding the server, but to make this work correctly I'll need a person that's very good at making clients.
The client coder needs to be able to: Add Item Masks NPC Masks Have it go directly to a certain IP (If you have no clue I can do it) with no other way to put a different IP in Correctly change the name of the client Change colors of the HP bar Change the colors of the loading bar (in the client)
I'll go over it with you more when your chosen
Seriously, I need a good client coder, just tell me how good you are and why I should choose you.

item.title: 'SinScape' ? New name later maybe :P
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

I’ve decided to make a quick one day project. You just download a client, open it, make a character and play. Nothing else.

I’ll be coding the server, but to make this work correctly I’ll need a person that’s very good at making clients.

The client coder needs to be able to:
Add Item Masks
NPC Masks
Have it go directly to a certain IP (If you have no clue I can do it) with no other way to put a different IP in
Correctly change the name of the client
Change colors of the HP bar
Change the colors of the loading bar (in the client)

I’ll go over it with you more when your chosen

Seriously, I need a good client coder, just tell me how good you are and why I should choose you.
